mapper.insert: INSERT INTO speech( spcJobTag, spcJobTitle, spcJobQuestion, regdate, regno ) VALUES( #{spcJobTag}, #{spcJobTitle}, #{spcJobQuestion}, now(), #{regno} )
mapper.select: SELECT speechNo, spcJobTag, spcJobTitle, spcJobQuestion, regdate, regno, upddate, updno FROM speech WHERE regno=#{regno}

SELECT S.speechNo AS speechNo, S.spcJobTag AS spcJobTag, S.spcJobTitle AS spcJobTitle, S.spcJobQuestion AS spcJobQuestion, S.regno AS regno, S.regdate AS regdate, U.userName AS userName FROM speech S INNER JOIN user U ON S.REGNO =U.USERNO
SELECT speechNo, spcJobTag, spcJobTitle, spcJobQuestion, regdate, regno, upddate, updno FROM speech WHERE speechNo = #{speechNo}

INSERT INTO file( fileOriginName, fileNewName, filePath, speechNo, regno, regdate ) VALUES ( #{fDTO.fileOriginName}, #{fDTO.fileNewName}, #{fDTO.filePath}, #{sDTO.speechNo}, #{sDTO.regno}, now() )
SELECT last_insert_id() FROM DUAL;
mapper.select: SELECT S.speechNo AS speechNo, S.spcJobTitle AS spcJobTitle, S.spcJobQuestion AS spcJobQuestion, U.userName AS userName, F.fileNewName AS fileNewName, F.fileNo AS fileNo FROM speech S INNER JOIN file F ON F.speechNo = S.speechNo AND F.speechNo = #{speechNo} INNER JOIN user U ON F.regno = U.userNo
SELECT fileNewName FROM file WHERE fileNo=#{fileNo}

SELECT S.spcJobTitle AS spcJobTitle, S.spcJobQuestion AS spcJobQuestion, U.userName AS userName, F.fileNewName AS fileNewName, F.regno AS regno, A.transcript AS transcript, A.confidence AS confidence FROM speech S INNER JOIN file F ON F.speechNo = S.speechNo AND F.fileNo = #{fileNo} INNER JOIN user U ON F.regno = U.userNo INNER JOIN answer A ON F.fileNo=A.fileNo
mapper.insert: INSERT answer ( transcript, confidence, fileNo, word, term, startTime, endTime ) values ( #{transcript}, #{confidence}, #{fileNo}, #{word}, #{term}, #{startTime}, #{endTime} )
